sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {HStack,VStack,Select,Heading} from '@chakra-ui/react';
import { useForm} from 'react-hook-form';
import { FormControl, FormLabel, Input, Button, FormErrorMessage } from '@chakra-ui/react';
import * as yup from 'yup';
import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup';
import axios from "axios";

const schema = yup.object().shape({
  name: yup.string().required('Name is required'),
  dob: yup.string().required('DOB is required'),
  sex: yup.string().oneOf(["male", "female"]).required('Sex orientation is required'),
  idType: yup.string().oneOf(["aadhar", "pan"]),
  govtId: yup
      .string()
      .test("len", "Invalid Govt Id", (val, { parent }) => {
      if (!val) return true;
      if (parent.idType === "aadhar") {
          return /^\d{12}$/.test(val);
      }
      if (parent.idType === "pan") {
          return /^[A-Za-z]{5}\d{4}[A-Za-z]{1}$/.test(val);
      }
      return false;
      }),

  mobile: yup
  .string()
  .test(
      "is-in",
      "Invalid mobile number",
      (val) =>
      val && /^(\+91|0)?[6-9]\d{9}$/.test(val) // Indian number validation
  ),
  occupation: yup.string(),
  maritalStatus: yup.string(),
  religion: yup.string(),
  bloodGroup: yup.string(),
  nationality: yup.string(),
});


function UserRegistrationForm() {
  const {
    register,
    handleSubmit,
    formState: { errors },
  } = useForm({
    resolver: yupResolver(schema),
});

  const onSubmit = (data) => {
    axios
      .post("http://localhost:4000/api/users", data)
      .then((res) => {
        console.log(res.data);
      })
      .catch((err) => {
        console.error(err);
      });
  };

  return (
    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} >
            <VStack>
            <Heading children={"Personal Details"} m={10} />
            <HStack p={10}>
                <FormLabel htmlFor="name">Name:*</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={errors.password} isRequired>
                        
                    <Input {...register("name")} />
                    <FormErrorMessage>{errors.name?.message}</FormErrorMessage>
                </FormControl>
                <FormLabel htmlFor="dob">DOB:*</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={errors.dob} isRequired>
                        
                    <Input {...register("dob")} />
                    <FormErrorMessage>{errors.dob?.message}</FormErrorMessage>
                </FormControl>

                <FormLabel>Sex:*</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={errors.sex} isRequired>
                    
                    <Select {...register("sex")}>
                    <option value="male">Male</option>
                    <option value="female">Female</option>
                    </Select>
                    <FormErrorMessage>{errors.sex?.message}</FormErrorMessage>
                </FormControl>
            
            

            </HStack>
            <Heading children={"Contact Details"} m={10} />
            <HStack p={10}>
                <FormLabel>ID Type:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={errors.idType}>
                    
                    <Select {...register("idType")}>
                    <option value="aadhar">Aadhar</option>
                    <option value="pan">PAN</option>
                    </Select>
                    <FormErrorMessage>{errors.idType?.message}</FormErrorMessage>
                </FormControl>
                <FormLabel>Govt Issued ID:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={errors.govtId}>
                    
                    <Input {...register("govtId")} />
                    <FormErrorMessage>{errors.govtId?.message}</FormErrorMessage>
                </FormControl>
                <FormLabel htmlFor="mobile">Mobile</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={!!errors.mobile}>
                    
                    <Input type="tel" id="mobile" {...register("mobile")} />
                    <FormErrorMessage>{errors.mobile?.message}</FormErrorMessage>
                </FormControl>

            </HStack>

            <Heading children={"Address Details"} m={10} />
            <HStack p={10}>
                <FormLabel htmlFor="address">Address:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={!!errors.address}>
                    <Input type="text" id="address" {...register("address")} />
                </FormControl>

                <FormLabel htmlFor="state">State:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={!!errors.state}>
                    <Input type="text" id="state" {...register("state")} />
                </FormControl>

                <FormLabel htmlFor="city">City:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={!!errors.city}>
                    <Input type="text" id="city" {...register("city")} />
                </FormControl>

            </HStack>

            <HStack p={10}>
                <FormLabel htmlFor="country">Country:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={!!errors.country}>
                    <Input type="text" id="country" {...register("country")} />
                </FormControl>

                <FormLabel htmlFor="pincode">Pincode:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl isInvalid={!!errors.pincode}>
                    <Input type="text" id="pincode" {...register("pincode")} />
                </FormControl>
            </HStack>

            <Heading children={"Other Details"} m={10} />
                
            <HStack p={10}>
                
                <FormLabel>Occupation:</FormLabel>
                    <FormControl id="occupation" >
                    <Input {...register("occupation")} />
                </FormControl>

                <FormLabel>Marital Status:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl id="maritalStatus">
                    <Select {...register("maritalStatus")} placeholder="Select option">
                        <option value="single">Single</option>
                        <option value="married">Married</option>
                        <option value="divorced">Divorced</option>
                        <option value="widowed">Widowed</option>
                    </Select>
                </FormControl>
                <FormLabel>Religion:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl id="religion">
                    
                    <Input {...register("religion")} />
                </FormControl>

                <FormLabel>Blood Group:</FormLabel>
                <FormControl id="bloodGroup">
                    
                <Select {...register("bloodGroup")} placeholder="Select option" >
                    <option value="A+">A+</option>
                    <option value="A-">A-</option>
                    <option value="B+">B+</option>
                    <option value="B-">B-</option>
                    <option value="AB+">AB+</option>
                    <option value="AB-">AB-</option>
                    <option value="O+">O+</option>
                    <option value="O-">O-</option>
                </Select>
                </FormControl>

            </HStack>

            <HStack p={10}>
                <FormLabel>Nationality</FormLabel>
                <FormControl id="nationality">
                <Input {...register("nationality")} />
                </FormControl>
            </HStack>

            <HStack>
                <Button w={80} h={40} cursor="pointer"  size={"md"} type="submit">
                    Cancel
                </Button>
                <Button w={80} h={40} variant='ghost' cursor="pointer" size={"md"} type="submit">
                    Submit
                </Button>
            </HStack>



                
            </VStack>
            
        </form>
  );
}

export default UserRegistrationForm;
